question: Which of the following countries is not the founding member of International North South Transportation Corridor (INSTC)?
explanation: The International Northâ€“South Transport Corridor (INSTC) is a 7,200-km-long multi-mode network of ship, rail and land route for moving freight between India, Russia, Iran, Europe and Central Asia. Russia, Iran and India signed the agreement for the NSTC project on the 16th of May 2002. China is not the founding member of International North South Transportation Corridor (INSTC).
